title: Kinda Funny's Message to Henry
description:
Henry's a brave 8-year-old fighting cancer, and all he wanted was a shout-out from Kinda Funny. We decided to do more.

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody i'm greg miller and this is the master of hype snow bike mic mike how are you greg i'm doing great i'm here with you and i'm ready to bring some fun bring some smiles right now that's right ladies and gentlemen this isn't the normal twitch.tv kind of funny game stream no this is a special message to henry hello henry it's greg and mike i already said that part uh your dad joe reached out to us and said hey my son henry is going through chemo right now he has lymphoma he loves snow bike mic and he loves greg miller and he wanted to get a message from you guys and so i say this well first off hi henry that's the henry what up you know he did the thing mike how do you define bravery greg you're gonna put me on the spot like that bravery to me is that feeling of uncomfort that feeling of fear coming upon you but bravery is that warm feeling deep down inside that fire that comes from your belly all the way up to your chest and right out when you think of facing your

that feeling of fear coming upon you but bravery is that warm feeling deep down inside that fire that comes from your belly all the way up to your chest and right out when you think of facing your fears and taking that one step forward to go out and try bravery is not being afraid to try to fail to give it your all and it's really fun to think about bravery because bravery gives me goosebumps bravery gives me chills because i love being brave i love giving it my all and i love trying things that i'm not accustomed to trying things that make me feel uncomfortable trying things that i'm scared of because bravery pushes me to go out of my comfort zone and be great that's a great way to put it mike on i couldn't agree more with you i think that's the thing that people lose sight of uh henry i don't know if you know this never always told you lately you are a very brave little boy uh of course you are going through chemotherapy and i'm sure maybe you know why gosh i'm old so i don't know i

don't know if you know this never always told you lately you are a very brave little boy uh of course you are going through chemotherapy and i'm sure maybe you know why gosh i'm old so i don't know i went through chemotherapy in 2012 uh i had cancer myself and had to go i had hodgkin's lymphoma stage two i went through and did chemotherapy chemotherapy myself and what i think makes you so brave is the idea that when you're your age and when people are you know thinking of bravery they think of not being afraid they think of being fearless when it's actually completely the opposite right like brave people of course are afraid and they of course have to deal with that and they you know they know the road is tough and they have to keep going through it and they they are the ones that keep going through it and that's why you're so brave i can speak from first-hand experience henry of how tough chemotherapy is and i know how much it uh makes you not be yourself and i know how much it sucks

through it and that's why you're so brave i can speak from first-hand experience henry of how tough chemotherapy is and i know how much it uh makes you not be yourself and i know how much it sucks and it isn't fun to be a part of and so we just wanted to say of course we wish you the best we want you to get well uh of course and you know you can do this you got this right mike you got this henry and we're here for you we're cheering you on we're rooting you on and we're right behind you every step of the way but still like mike the thing i'm told is that the kids these days love free things have you heard this have you ever heard that they're like free things i like free things i know you do youtube mike i'm well aware so uh henry i asked your dad a little bit about you right what did he say here he says of course you have an xbox you love fortnite you love minecraft those are the things you're playing all the time right now so i figured what can we do for you for xbox fortnite in

he say here he says of course you have an xbox you love fortnite you love minecraft those are the things you're playing all the time right now so i figured what can we do for you for xbox fortnite in minecraft and so let's start with fortnite all right i feel like we play fortnite a lot mike you know that and so we figured henry when you are up to it why don't you come play fortnite with us why don't we play some fortnite and if your dad are all out why don't you come stream fortnite with us you can play with us we'll stream the game you can be on twitch.tv kind of funny games with us that'll be good but we figured mike that's not enough that's never enough greg you love minecraft so i reached out to my friend over at xbox and he gave me two codes that'll get you ten thousand mine coins i don't play minecraft i think that's a lot of coins though that's a lot of mine a lot of minecraft bucks or whatever ten thousand your dad has the codes for you're all set there on top of that uh over

and i said andy you've got a key and i for all kind of funny you know he does most of the graphics he uh you know designs what kind of funny looks like and i said can you design henry a one-of-a-kind kind of funny xbox controller and so henry this is what andy made you see it here all the kind of funny colors represent it's beautiful mike you got that sweet you got that kind of funny blue you got the pinks you got the purples it's the games it's the kind of funny natural colors that are just normally there it's everything you could possibly want in a kind of funny xbox controller so henry that is on its way to you henry thank you for being a kind of funny fan uh thank you to your father for letting you watch kind of funny content when he has no idea what you know horrible tirade i'm about to go on mike what do you have to say henry continue to be brave get that smile on keep trying and just know that we're here for you every step of the way until next time henry it's been our pleasure
